hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '^(protected/|migrations/|.env)'; then echo "BLOCKED: Cannot modify protected path: $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" && exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_COMMAND" | grep -qE 'git (push --force|reset --hard|clean -f)'; then echo "BLOCKED: Destructive git command requires manual execution" && exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q '\.py$'; then ruff check "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" || echo 'Lint issues found'; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q '\.py$'; then ruff format "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'config\|secret\|auth'; then echo "ALERT: Sensitive file modified: $CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; fi
